title: Big South Fork National River & Recreation Area: Concessionaires & Outfitters
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Concessionaires & Outfitters            Concessionaires & Outfitters          NAME SERVICES PHONE NUMBER             WEBSITE/EMAIL   Sheltowee Trace Outfitters Guided River Trips, Equipment Rental and Shuttles  1-800-541-RAFT or 526-7238-7238  www.ky-rafting.com   Ace Kayaking School River Guide Services 865-385-3204 www.acekayaking.com   Backwoods Adventures Hiking and Backcountry Guide Services 931-863-3853 931-397-3490  http://backwoodsadventures.wix.com/backwoods-adventures    Borderland Expeditions Adventure Tours, Rentals, and Transport 844-344-2109  http://borderlandexpeditions.com/    Wilderness Taxi & Tours Shuttle and Guide Services 423-215-4800 or 423-569-2669 http://wilderness-taxi.wix.com/wilderness-taxi   R&M Brooks Store Bike Rentals 423-663-7503 tiffanyterry7503@gmail.com   Roger Branscum Sales Firewood 606-516-2031 rogerbranscum@hotmail.com   Bandy Creek Stables Horse Boarding, Camp Store and WiFi 423-286-7433 www.bandycreekstables.com   Big South Fork Scenic Railway Train Rides 800-462-5664 www.bsfsry.com   Blue Heron Gift Shop & Concession Stand Food and Gifts 606-376-5620     Eastern National Bookstores Gifts and Novelty Items 423-286-7275 www.eparks.com/store   Station Camp Horse Camp Camping with Horses 931-319-6893 www.stationcamphorsecamp.com   Charit Creek Lodge Backcountry Lodging & Dining 865-696-5611 www.ccl-bsf.com
